dct_description_sm: Scale approximately 1:3,700,000 ; Relief shown pictorially ; Boundaries hand-colored ; Inset: Penōn de Velez ; Verso pages numbered 355 and 356 ; Map text in Latin. Text on verso in Dutch ; Detached from Gerard Mercator : Atlas sive cosmographicae meditationes ... (C. Koeman, Collection of maps and atlases ..., 1961, p. 137, 46.32). Originally published by Jodocus Hondius ; Amsterdam : Hendrik Hondius; Source: Mercator, Gerard, approximately 1565-1656. Atlas sive cosmographicae meditationes de fabrica mundi et fabricati figura. Amsterdam : Hendrik Hondius, 1634.
dct_spatial_sm: Spain--Peñón de Vélez de la Gomera
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
